article_text:
Richard Fuld Jr., who was chief executive of Lehman Brothers Holdings Inc., has been largely out of the public eye since the firm collapsed in 2008.

That is set to change next month.

The organizers of the 2015 Marcum MicroCap Conference said Mr. Fuld will address conference attendees in his “first major public address since leaving Lehman...

twitter.title: Lehman’s Ex-CEO Is Resurfacing

Richard Fuld Jr., who was chief executive of Lehman Brothers Holdings Inc., has been largely out of the public eye since the firm collapsed in 2008.
